name: IndyVision
description:
IndyVision is a programming&design company with relevant experience with Android, Windows, Bada, and iPhone for applications, games but also provides back-end solutions. In design area, we can provide logos and branding design for companies, Ux/UI and prototyping solutions for your future application. We work with professionals and lates tehnologies in order to have best apps for our clients.
You can see the portfolio of our designer at https://dribbble.com/UberPixel
